explains: vt. 使不灭；使名垂千古，使不朽

sentences.en: He would immortalize her in a poem.
sentences.cn: 他会在诗歌里让她不朽。

sentences.en: Please sit for me in the studio, "he pleaded, and l will immortalize your beauty."
sentences.cn: 到我的画室里去坐着，好吗？我要为你画张像。

sentences.en: The answer, of course, is immortalize you and your companions in my historical records.
sentences.cn: 而答案当然是让你和你的伙伴们名留我的史册。
